message: Hello Bob, I have a great product that I think you'll love. I'm offering it to you for $120. Is this something you'd like to buy?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $110. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $95. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
I'm glad you're still interested in the product, Bob. I can do $105, but that's as low as I can go. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $98. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
I'm still open to negotiating, Bob. I can do $110, but I think I've already been very flexible. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
I appreciate your continued willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
I'm still interested in finding a mutually beneficial deal, Bob. I can do $108, but I'm starting to think that's my final offer. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
I appreciate your continued willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $102. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
